newsitem.title: USA: Entergy official to head London Electricity.
newsitem.headline: Entergy official to head London Electricity.

text.p: Entergy Corp said Monday Michael B. Bemis has been appointed to London Electricity Plc's board and been named chief executive of the company.
The action by London Electricity's board is effective immediately. Bemis, who will reside in London, is also Entergy's executive vice president of international retail operations, the company said.

In addition to the Bemis appointment, three additional Entergy-related appointments to London Electricity's board occurred. Ed Lupberger, Entergy's chairman, was appointed chairman of London Electricity's board while Gerald McInvale, Entergy's executive vice president and chief financial officer, and Terry Ogletree, Entergy Power Group's president, were named directors.
